ART_ATTENDANCE_IMPOSSIBLE: ART attendance model can only be estimated if ART programme data are used.
NO_COUNTRY_LEVEL_FIT: Cannot fit model at country level. Choose a different level.
MISSING_ART_DATA: ART dataset not provided. ART data cannot be selected Yes to include.
OPTIONS_ANC_DESCRIPTION: Optionally select which years of data to use at time point 1 and 2
OPTIONS_ANC_CLIENTS_LABEL: Data year to calibrate number of ANC clients
OPTIONS_ANC_COVERAGE_LABEL: ART coverage prior to first ANC
OPTIONS_ART_DESCRIPTION: Select whether to include ART data or not in model run
OPTIONS_QUARTER1_LABEL: Calendar quarter at midpoint of survey
OPTIONS_ART_NEIGHBOURING_DISTRICT_HELP: Model proportion of ART residents who seek treatment in neighboring districts
OPTIONS_SURVEY_DESCRIPTION: Select which survey to use for each indicator and whether to run the model with survey ART coverage or VLS.
OPTIONS_RECENTLY_INFECTED_LABEL: Use survey data on proportion recently infected
OPTIONS_POPULATION_CALIBRATION_DESCRIPTI: Options for calibrating to Spectrum population size. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Calibration to Spectrum population is completed before model fitting.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_DESCRIPTION: Options for calibrating to Spectrum outputs. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Some calibrations will invalidate model inference to survey, ART programme, and ANC testing data. If calibration adjustments are large, it is recommended to review Spectrum results and Naomi input data rather than accept large calibration adjustments.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_P: Calibrate to Spectrum population size by sex and 5-year age group by national or subnational. If national Spectrum file, national and subnational will return the same result.
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total PLHIV.
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_A: Adjust to Spectrum number on ART
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total on ART
Adjust to Spectrum number aware of HIV status
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total number aware of HIV status from Shiny90
OPTIONS_CALIBRATION_ADJUST_TO_SPECTRUM_I: Adjust to Spectrum number of new infections
Calibrate to Spectrum mean total new infections
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: Options for controlling downloaded model results
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_MAX_ITERATIONS_HELP: Maximum number of iteration for model run
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_NO_OF_SIMULATIONS_HELP: Number of simulatons for generating uncertainty ranges
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_SIMULATION_SEED_HELP: Random number generator seed for uncertainty sample
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_PERMISSIVE_HELP: Select 'Yes' to allow fits with convergence or data errors
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_MEAN_LABEL: Logit prior mean for neighboring district attraction
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_LOGIT_HELP: Logit offset for odds of obtaining ART in neighbouring district compared to home district
AREAS_AREA_LEVEL_HIERARCHY_BOUNDARIES_MI: Either supply levels, hierarchy, and boundaries, or area_merged
AREAS_LEVEL_NOT_UNIQUE:
Area levels not unique.
Duplicated level: {{missing_levels}}
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PREVALENCE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for HIV prevalence observations
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_ART_COVERAGE_HELP: Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for ART coverage
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_DEFF_PROPORTION_RECENT_: Survey design effect - Proportion recently infected
Approximate DEFF to scale effective sample size for survey for proportion recently infected amongst HIV positive
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_PROJECTION_QUARTER_LABEL: Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection
OPTIONS_OUTPUT_PROJECTION_QUARTER_HELP: Calendar quarter to generate short-term projection. Must be after calendar quarter to generate estimates.
INDICATOR_LABEL_PREVALENCE: Proportion of total population HIV positive
INDICATOR_LABEL_PLHIV: Number of people living with HIV
INDICATOR_LABEL_INFECTIONS: Number of new infections per year
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ART_COVERAGE: ART coverage among ANC attendees prior to first ANC
OPTIONS_ART_TIME_VARYING_ART_ATTEND_HELP: Allow the odds for seeking treatment in neighbouring district to change over time.
NO_ART_DATA_FOR_QUARTER:
No ART data found for quarter {{calendar_quarter}}.
Set 'Include ART data' to 'No' if you intend to include no ART data.
ANC_ON_ART_GREATER_THAN_TOTAL_POSITIVE: ANC testing on ART greater than ANC testing total positive.
ANC_DATA_MISSING_FOR_YEAR: ANC testing data not found for year {{missing_year}}.
ANC_DATA_MISSING_FOR_YEAR_PLURAL: ANC testing data not found for years {{missing_year}}.
ANC_POSITIVE_GREATER_TOTAL_KNOWN: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees (numerator) is greater than number of ANC attendees with an HIV status outcome (denominator).
ART_COV_AND_VLS_SAME_SURVEY: Do not use ART coverage and VLS data from the same survey: {{survey_ids}}
ART_COV_AND_VLS_SAME_SURVEY_PLURAL: Do not use ART coverage and VLS data from the same surveys: {{survey_ids}}
PJNZ_SHAPE_CODE_MISMATCH: Some spectrum region code in your shape file are not in PJNZ extracts. Please update your shape file to include the correct codes
SCOPE_AREAS_MISSING_HIERARCHY: Scope area {{missing_areas}} not found in hierarchy.
SCOPE_AREAS_MISSING_HIERARCHY_PLURAL: Scope areas {{missing_areas}} not found in hierarchy.
SHAPE_SPECTRUM_REGION_ALL_NA: Spectrum region code column is all missing in your shape file. Update the shape file with Spectrum region code for the estimation level.
INVALID_CALIBRATE_OBJECT: Can't calibrate this model output please re-run model and try calibration again
MISSING_CALIBRATION_OPTIONS: Calibration cannot be run, missing options for {{missing}}
OPTIONS_ANC_MONTHS_LABEL: Months included in ANC reporting for ANC clients
OPTIONS_ANC_MONTHS_HELP: Number of months included in ANC reporting in this year.
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_USE_KISH_HELP: Use Kish Effective Sample Size (ESS) for survey data likelihood
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_PLHIV: Number of HIV positive women attending ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ALREADY_ART: Number already on ART prior prior to first ANC visit
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ART_NEW: Number of pregnant women initiated on ART at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_KNOWN_POS: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees aware of status prior to first ANC visit
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_TESTED_POS: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees tested at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_TESTED_NEG: Number of HIV negative ANC attendees tested at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_UNTREATED_PLHIV_NUM: Number of PLHIV not on ART
INDICATOR_LABEL_AWARE_PLHIV_PROP: Proportion of PLHIV aware of HIV positive status
INDICATOR_LABEL_UNAWARE_PLHIV_NUM: Number PLHIV unaware of HIV positive status
OPTIONS_ADVANCED_OUTPUT_AWARE_HELP: Calculating awareness of HIV status indicators requires .shiny90 files to be included in each PJNZ. If .shiny90 files are not available, select 'No' to proceed with model fitting.
ERROR_SHINY90_MISSING_1: .shiny90 file is not present for the following projection(s)
ERROR_SHINY90_MISSING_2: Reload PJNZ with .shiny90 included or set Advanced option 'Output awareness of HIV status indicators' to "No".
EXTRACT_INDICATORS_SIMULATE_ERROR: Error simulating output for indicator: {{varname}}. Please contact support for troubleshooting.
OPTIONS_USE_SURVEY_AGGREGATE_HELP: The uploaded survey dataset must be subsetted to exactly the data to be used in model calibration.
